descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Seth Curry finds his shooting stroke with a 23-point first quarter for the 76ers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Seth Curry goes OFF for 23-point first quarter) 2021/10/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Seth Curry goes OFF for 23-point first quarter

videos.description: Kenrich Williams feeds a beautiful pass to a cutting Aleksej Pokusevski for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kenrich Williams drops dime to Poku for the two-handed jam) 2021/10/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kenrich Williams drops dime to Poku for the two-handed jam

videos.description: An Oklahoma City Thunder fan drains a miraculous half-court shot for $20,000.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Thunder fan drains half-court shot to win $20,000) 2021/10/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Thunder fan drains half-court shot to win $20,000

videos.description: Josh Giddey finds Darius Bazley in transition for the fast-break slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giddey delivers smooth bounce pass to Bazley for the dunk) 2021/10/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giddey delivers smooth bounce pass to Bazley for the dunk

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander blows past his defender and punches home the powerful two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA shakes-and-bakes his way past defender for the slam) 2021/10/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA shakes-and-bakes his way past defender for the slam

videos.description: Lu Dort drives in the lane and throws down a ferocious two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lu Dort skies for the powerful two-handed dunk) 2021/10/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lu Dort skies for the powerful two-handed dunk
